This Django template creates a CSV containing all the data required to import using GTB.

column9: depth{% for tasklist in tasklists %}{% for task in tasklist.tasks %}

column6: {% if task.completed %}"{{ utc_prefix_str }}{{ task.completed|date:"Y-m-d H:i:s" }}"{% endif %}
